name: research-events-medication-htn
description: Mining meaningful hypertension medication events from routinely collected EHR data.

scripts.example: node index.js -a resources/example-data.txt && sort resources/example-data.txt.done > resources/example-data.txt.done.sorted && perl parse_drug_file.pl resources/example-data.txt.done.sorted

author: Richard Williams <richard.williams2@manchester.ac.uk>
